page.title: 07THE COMPASS THEATRE.
page.content: The Compass{Theatre}is in Ickenham, in Glebe Avenue, opposite the station (the top left square of the map). It is not just a theatre, it is a {Community Arts Centre.} The windows display posters showing current and coming events. There are musicals, plays, jazz concerts and regular clubs like pottery, art and junior drama. Inside, the stage is in the main hall. Nearby are dressing rooms for the performers. There are also workshops and storage spaces for the props and staging. The Compass also has its own Bistro. From the outside the Compass is a mixture of old and new. The hall is a newer part. At the front is a garden area with rose-beds and also the car park entrance. (See photograph) Sadly, the Compass faces closure.
